# f5xc_ike1 (Resource)

Shape of the IKE Phase1 profile specification

~> **Note** For more information about this resource, please refer to the [F5 XC API Documentation](https://docs.cloud.f5.com/docs/api/).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_ike1" "example" {
  name      = "example"
  namespace = "system"

  labels = {
    "env" = "production"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Ike1. Must be unique within the namespace.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Ike1 will be created.

### Optional

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations to apply to this resource.
- `ike_keylifetime_hours` (Block, Optional) Hours. Input Hours (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ike_keylifetime_hours))
- `ike_keylifetime_minutes` (Block, Optional) Minutes. Set IKE Key Lifetime in minutes (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ike_keylifetime_minutes))
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to this resource.
- `reauth_disabled` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--reauth_disabled))
- `reauth_timeout_days` (Block, Optional) Days. Set Duration in days (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--reauth_timeout_days))
- `reauth_timeout_hours` (Block, Optional) Hours. Input Hours (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--reauth_timeout_hours))
- `use_default_keylifetime` (Block, Optional) Empty. This can be used for messages where no values are needed (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--use_default_keylifetime))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using namespace/name format
terraform import f5xc_ike1.example system/example
```
